committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: To extend the period of authorization for a study of the fishery resources and fishery habitats of the Russian River basin, California, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to include the Laguna de Santa Rosa in the area of the Russian River (California) basin for which a fishery study is mandated. Modifies the contents of the study. Includes specified expenditures by the California State Coastal Conservancy and the County of Sonoma in the required State contribution to the fishery study. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To extend the period of authorization for a study of the fishery resources and fishery habitats of the Russian River basin, California, and for other purposes.
